title: Katriyahotel.Com Now Offering The Best Hotel Services In Hyderabad With Most Premium Facilities
text: Katriyahotel.Com Now Offering The Best Hotel Services In Hyderabad With Most Premium Facilities India, 14 September 2015 -- Katriya Hotel is one of the most grand and luxury hotels and restaurants in Hyderabad. Katriyahotel.com is announcing its premium and distinguished facilities and services which make itâ€™s the best Hyderabad based hotel. FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Hyderabad, India (September 14, 2015) - Katriyahotel.com is now announcing its best quality restaurants, hotels, and banquet halls in Hyderabad. The website is publicizing the royal and grand part of the hotel empire. Hyderabad is generally known for its royal food, culture and exclusive lifestyle. The most premium and grand hotels and restaurants lie in Hyderabad only. Katriyahotel.com is presenting the most comfortable and royal stay in Katriya Hotel which is claimed to be the most leading and recommended hotel among the premium Hotels in Hyderabad. The website is mentioning about the grand facilities and services that a customer can expect while staying at Katriya hotel. Katriyahotel.com talks about the grand arrangement and menus in the banquet hall of the hotel. According to the hotel website, the luxurious banquet hall of Katriya is one of the Best Banquet Halls in Hyderabad. From normal snacks to luxurious and premium cuisines served in the royal manner, Katriya has it all which a customer can expect from an exclusive and luxurious hotel banquet services. The website is asserting that the hotel empire acquires 225 rooms and suites, catering of 10 to 2000 people at 18 banquet venues, elegant and lounge bar, 24x7 available coffee shop and almost all the premium facility containing Best Restaurants in Hyderabad . About Katriyahotel Katriya hotel is the leading and one of the best service providing hotel and restaurant in Hyderabad. The hotel is serving the guests with most luxurious and premium services since many years. Katriya has a very reputed past related to hotel and restaurant business. The hotel has enormous capacity for the guests. Katriya hotel invites the guests for the grand stay, organizing parties, meetings, events, weddings and much more essential functions which lead to the huge amount of public gathering. For more information about Katriyahotel, visit http://www.katriyahotel.com/ ###
